TopicTitle: A Nation Map I Made In MS Paint

Articles.Content:
OK, this is a (honestly very bad) map of Kerbin with some nations added. The color of the nation is shown by the line connecting the territory to its name. Original map is the official Kerbin-Side map by AlphaAsh. I just added the countries.

This will be canon for my next story (and only my story), so you can consider it a bit of a teaser!
Did you just take the KerbinSide mod's map and add some text to it?

Did you just take the KerbinSide mod's map and add some text to it?

To be honest, yes. I mentioned that in the first post. Honestly, I'm really not too proud of it, and I can take it down if there is a problem.
